article_title: Tax Refunds To Illegals Under Obama Immigration Action Would Be Stopped By Bill

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Illegal workers are armed with newly minted Social Security numbers under the President's executive action on immigration. This entitles them to claim three years of tax refunds even if they have never filed returns.
og.title: Tax Refunds To Illegals Under Obama Immigration Action Would Be Stopped By Bill
